AU.notes: May apply online (Online Visitor e600 visa).

AT.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area

IN.notes: e-Tourist Visa for holders of Anguillian passport, Caymanian passport, Montserratian passport and Turks and Caicos Islands passport.

JM.notes: Not applicable to holders of British Virgin Islands passport and Caymanian passport.

KE.notes: Can also be entered on a visa issued by Rwanda or Uganda.

KI.notes: Visa not required for holders of Bermudian passport, Caymanian passport, Montserratian passport, Turks and Caicos Islands passport.

KR.notes: Visa-Free access to Jeju Island for 30 days

Available at Berbera, Borama, Burao, Erigavo and Hargeisa airports.
30 days, available at Bosaso Airport, Galcaio Airport and Mogadishu Airport.

UG.notes: May apply online.Can also be entered on a visa issued by Kenya or Rwanda.

AE.notes: Visa on arrival for holders of a Certificate of Entitlement to the Right of Abode.

GB.notes: Visa not required for a visit of up to six months, or if the BOTC passport holder also has a British Citizen passport and/or a certificate of the right of abode. Otherwise, a visa is required for work, study, joining family or any other stay of more than six months.

US.notes: Visa not required for holders of Bermudian passport and for holders of Caymanian passport and Turks and Caicos Islands passport arriving directly from the Cayman Islands or Turks and Caicos Islands and holding a current certificate from the Clerk of the Court, indicating no criminal record. British Virgin Islands passport holders can travel to United States Virgin Islands and then continue travel to other parts of the United States if they present a Certificate of Good Conduct issued by the Royal Virgin Islands Police Department indicating no criminal record.

UZ.notes: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

ZW.notes: Visa not required for holders of Anguillian passport, Caymanian passport, Montserratian passport, Turks and Caicos Islands passport.
